explanation: [0-0] Against a dark green background, two men stand at a gray table. On the left is a man wearing a Santa hat and a yellow jacket, and on the right is a man in a fluorescent green vest. On the table, an object resembling a slender cone is wrapped in tin foil, with smoke rising from its top. The man in the fluorescent green vest holds a lighter in his left hand, placing it near the top of the cone-shaped object. Both men focus on the cone's top, and a cardboard box is visible behind them.

[0-8] The man in the fluorescent green vest ignites the top of the cone with the lighter, producing sparks. He tosses the lighter onto the table and rushes to one side of the cardboard box with the man in the yellow jacket, who goes to the other side. Both men lift the box with their hands, placing it over their heads and crouching down. The sparks at the cone's top burn downwards for a moment before extinguishing, leaving behind a metal wire.

He tosses the lighter onto the table and rushes to one side of the cardboard box with the man in the yellow jacket, who goes to the other side. He tosses the lighter onto the table and rushes to one side of the cardboard box with the man in the yellow jacket, who goes to the other side. Both men lift the box with their hands, placing it over their heads and crouching down. The sparks at the cone's top burn downwards for a moment before extinguishing, leaving behind a metal wire.

[8-15] Finally, the man in the fluorescent green vest pushes the cardboard box upwards, glances at the cone, then pushes the box aside and walks to the table. He reaches out with his left hand and pokes the bottom of the cone, causing it to wobble. He pokes it again and then clenches his fists in front of his chest. The man in the yellow jacket approaches, pokes the bottom of the cone, then picks it up and tears open the tin foil wrapping. Inside is a large lollipop. Holding the lollipop in his left hand and pointing at it with the index finger of his right hand, he laughs and tilts his head back. The man in the fluorescent green vest looks at the lollipop, his mouth wide open with laughter.
